name: Stream of Consciousness (palemachiine)
description:
Inspired by mental tangents and composed of snippets from personal notes, navigate through ~100 short sentences in this simple text-based game. Take each sentence as it is, piece together your own narrative, or just get lost in someone else's words for a while.

CONTROLS:

Space to advance, Q to quit, Numbers/Keypad to choose a word. If you get stuck, try choosing a different word!
